actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the third week in October each year as National Screen Printing Week and to proclaim Tuesday of such week as National Screen Printing Day.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim the third week in October each year as "National Screen Printing Week" and to proclaim Tuesday of such week as "National Screen Printing Day".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the third week in October each year as National Screen Printing Week and to proclaim Tuesday of such week as National Screen Printing Day.
